title: Gerald Giampa R.I.P.
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103125904/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 22.Jun.2009 2.58pm 

I never had the opportunity to meet him in person but we did exchange email from time to time. The person I got to know was both a gentleman and a character. More information about his passing on [P22â€™s blog.](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103125904/http:/tr.im/pnLz)
author: Miss Tiffany
